attributes.action: Opt-Out Organ Donation Policy For Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
More details

I was an altruistic donor back in 11/11/2015 when I donated my kidney. I was told it had gone to a lady who dialysis wasn' t working for anymore and she was very ill. I am very passionate to this cause as recipients can lead a normal life after receiving their kidney and so can the donor.
attributes.background:
For too long now we have seen loved ones die or not have the quality of life that they derserve as a result of organ failure whilst living in hope that a donor would be found. This would mean carrying a card in the event of death if you did NOT want to donate your
organs.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
